    level="1"
    right="Item 19"
    pfs=""
>
[Umbraex Eye](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1787)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #185: A Taste of Ashes](/Sources.aspx?ID=188) pg. 79

**Price** 34,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Like the rest of its form, the eyes of the legendary umbraex darvakka (page 83) collapse into ashes when the creature is destroyed. Rarely, when the umbraex wishes to impart information beyond its ashen reconstitution, it ejects one of its eyes at the moment of destruction. This large orb hardens into an obsidian-like substance that swirls with captivated motes of darkness deep within. While you hold the _umbraex eye_, you have [lifesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=21) (imprecise) 120 feet.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> 1 minute (command, Interact);  **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** Name a person, event, or location and the _umbraex eye_ shows 1 minute of relevant memory the umbraex witnessed firsthand. The events are displayed as clear images in the eye and accompanied by sound. If the umbraex has no relevant memories, the eye merely flickers with shadows.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
